official_title: A joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue a proclamation designating the fourth Sunday in September of each year as "Good Neighbor Day."

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to issue a proclamation designating the fourth Sunday in September of each year as "Good Neighbor Day."

titles.title: A joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue a proclamation designating the fourth Sunday in September of each year as "Good Neighbor Day."
